title: Documentation - List of audit log sources for PA
abstract:
# Documentation - List of audit log sources for PA
This page contains information about the following original sources that capture audit logs:
- [Anthos Identity Service audit logs](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-ais-logs) 
- [Kubernetes audit logs](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-kubernetes) 
- [Observability audit logger](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-observability-logger) 
- [Service Mesh Envoy access logs](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-service-mesh-envoy) 
- [System logging protocol (syslog) audit logs](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-syslog
